flow.descriptionCdata:
42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.1766c383-b808-4481-9da3-83b88010f994.description=This workflow returns the Resource provider details. Results\: providerSAP providerUsername providerPassword 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.2b90ab1c-4cc3-4187-9f06-8626d399e564.description=
This subflow was created by the Web Services Wizard to invoke the powerOnLogicalServers operation on https\://tufnellpark\:51443/hpio/controller/soap/v2?wsdl. Note that the inputs to this flow which correspond to web service inputs are optional inputs.  This is due to the fact that web services definitions usually incorrectly indicate that too many inputs are required, and mirroring those settings in the flow would force you to enter unused values when running the flow.  The xmlTemplate input on the Invoke Method 2 step of this flow contains a template of the xml message to be sent, and the fields preceded by the comment "<\!--Optional\:-->" or "<\!--zero or more repetitions-->" are those which the web service indicates are optional; all others are indicated to be required.

Inputs\:
host - The host that is running the web service
port - The port on the host running the web service
logicalServerNames0 - The input named powerOnLogicalServers|0|logicalServerNames of the complex type\: powerOnLogicalServers|0
serviceName - The input named powerOnLogicalServers|serviceName of the complex type\: powerOnLogicalServers

Responses\:
success - The SOAP command was accepted by the web service
failure - Something went wrong while making the SOAP request

Extra Results\:
document - The raw XML response of the web service
documentStripped - The XML response of the web service stripped of namespaces
requestId - The output given by the XPath\: /Envelope/Body/powerOnLogicalServersResponse/requestId/text()
42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.2f1564b7-a8a4-4c30-a06d-b5333c742fc7.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.54baf610-eb27-421f-a6ca-ff7c242c7977.prompt=User Identifier 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.5e466026-4cb7-4a78-9c9e-2de64d87740f.prompt=Artifact ID 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.60e4c59e-d6a0-40a2-b9be-14a1846720da.prompt=User Identifier 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.6a272378-1405-4457-a6be-e6a06a09b3c5.prompt=Process Instance ID 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.6b477627-c251-4268-afa3-4a4c4d48c3c7.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.792e1dbf-b308-439b-b38c-a4f3c044e0fb.prompt=Process Instance ID 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.8215a274-6f16-4b7d-97c6-312f5a91f000.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.89044da8-5fef-4395-90f7-8a63dfb272bd.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.9dba2e0c-7491-4e1f-8fba-89cc5095aef2.prompt=User Identifier 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.a021e609-e5d1-4bd9-9626-dab2078271ff.prompt=Resource Provider ID 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.description=
This workflow performs MOE Add Disk operation on the server group identified by CSA Service Component

Inputs\:

CSA_CONTEXT_ID		- CSA Context Id
CSA_PROCESS_ID		- CSA Process Instance Id
SVC_COMPONENT_ID 		- This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
RSC_PROVIDER_ID		- This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL 	- This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 		- This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
			   Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE		- This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
RSC_POOL_ID		- This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
SVC_INSTANCE_ID		- This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID		- This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
PRN_COMPONENT_ID		- This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
REQ_ORG_ID 		- This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
REQ_USER_ID 		- This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
USR_ORG_ID 		- This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
RSC_BINDING_ID 		- This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

These tokens with the default values are resolved by CSA when the flow is invoked.

Responses\:
success - Workflow completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.e40d8dc5-d37d-4fcc-948b-1314bd7b184d.prompt=User Identifier 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.f5eb2092-507f-4e7e-bc68-6252ff22e946.prompt=User Identifier 42f5db9b-b1eb-4d26-ada7-da093be6ae70.fb53e594-fd92-4db3-871b-722bfd247521.prompt=Artifact ID
flow.name: MOE Add Disk

step.name: Add Disk To Logical Server Group
